header.title: Header
header.chrome_proxy_hint: Chrome will use this proxy address and launch with --ignore-certificate-errors flag

certificate.title: CA Certificate Installation
certificate.message: Install CA certificate for HTTPS proxy functionality
certificate.windowsHint: Windows: Double-click cacert.crt → Install Certificate → Current User → Place in store → Trusted Root Certification Authorities
certificate.macHint: macOS: Double-click cacert.pem, find Proxify CA in Keychain Access, double-click and set to Always Trust
certificate.linuxHint: Linux: Copy cacert.pem to /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/ and run sudo update-ca-certificates

sql_injection.message: SQL Injection vulnerability found in login.php page, CVSS Score: 7.5

vulnerabilities.selectPrompt: Select a vulnerability from the left to view details

issues.tab_content: Issues tab content will be displayed here.

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Intercept, view, and modify HTTP/S traffic

dsl.title: DSL Query
dsl.help_description: DSL (Domain Specific Language) queries allow you to filter HTTP history using expressions. For example, you can find requests or responses containing specific text.
dsl.function_contains: Check if the field contains the specified value

filter.title: Filter
filter.suffix_description: Set file extensions to filter, separated by commas
filter.suffix_placeholder: Enter file extensions to filter, e.g.: js,css,png,jpg
filter.suffix_hint: Comma-separated list of file extensions to filter out from the request history
filter.prefix_placeholder: Enter target prefix, e.g.: example.com or regular expression
filter.prefix_hint: Can use domain or path prefix. Use regex syntax when regex is enabled

proxy.select_item_hint: Please select an intercept item from the queue above
proxy.intercept_waiting_hint: Intercepted requests will appear in the queue
proxy.keyboard_shortcuts: Use keyboard shortcuts: F to forward, D to drop
proxy.intercept_instructions: Enable interception and browse to see and modify requests before they're sent to the server.
proxy.select_item: Select an item to view details
proxy.forward_request_first: Please forward the request first to get a response
proxy.test_intercept_step1: 1. Make sure browser proxy is set to ChYing proxy address (click the browser icon above to auto-configure)
proxy.test_intercept_step3: 3. Requests will appear in the queue above for processing
proxy.test_intercept_step4: 4. You can modify request content, then click Forward or Drop

repeater.title: Repeater
repeater.description: Manually repeat and modify HTTP requests
repeater.create_tab_hint: Create a new tab to start sending requests

modal.title: New Request
modal.headers_placeholder: One header per line, format: Key: Value

intruder.title: Intruder
intruder.add_position_tooltip: Mark selected text as payload position

attack_descriptions.sniper: Uses a single payload set and places it in each defined position, one at a time.
attack_descriptions.battering-ram: Uses a single payload set and places the same payload in all defined positions simultaneously.
attack_descriptions.pitchfork: Uses multiple payload sets, iterating through each set simultaneously, placing one payload in each position.
attack_descriptions.cluster-bomb: Uses multiple payload sets, trying all possible combinations of payloads from each set.

intruder.payload_description: This payload type lets you configure a simple list of strings that are used as payloads.
intruder.payload_processing_description: You can define rules to perform various processing tasks on each payload before it is used.
intruder.payload_encoding_description: This setting can be used to URL-encode selected characters within the final payload, for safe transmission within HTTP requests.
intruder.url_encode_chars_help: These characters will be URL-encoded before sending to the server. Common special characters: ./\=<>?+&*:"{'{'}{'}'}|^#
intruder.no_payload_positions: No payload positions defined. Insert §§ markers around values in the request.
intruder.no_results: No results yet. Start an attack to begin.
intruder.create_new_tab: Create a new tab to start an attack
intruder.add_marker_instructions: Add § markers around values to define payload positions.
intruder.processing_rule_description: Processing rules allow you to apply transformations to each payload value before it is sent.

decoder.title: Encoder/Decoder
decoder.description: Transform data using various encoding and decoding methods
decoder.create_new_tab: Create a new tab to start encoding/decoding

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.description: Extend functionality with various security tools

jwt_analyzer.title: JWT Analyzer
jwt_analyzer.verification_description: Verification of the Signature part is used to prevent data tampering.
jwt_analyzer.brute_error: It didn't explode, let's change the dictionary(⊙o⊙)…
jwt_analyzer.signature_hint: The signature cannot be edited directly. Modify the Header or Payload to regenerate a new JWT.
jwt_analyzer.enter_jwt_key: Please enter JWT and secret key
jwt_analyzer.header_tooltip: The Header part is a JSON object that describes the JWT metadata.
jwt_analyzer.header_alg: The alg attribute indicates the algorithm used, default is HMAC SHA256 (written as HS256).
jwt_analyzer.header_typ: The typ attribute represents the token type, JWT tokens are uniformly written as JWT.
jwt_analyzer.payload_tooltip: Payload is used to store the actual data to be transmitted. JWT defines 7 official fields:
jwt_analyzer.payload_iss: iss (Issuer): Entity that issued the JWT
jwt_analyzer.payload_nbf: nbf (Not Before): Time before which JWT must not be accepted
jwt_analyzer.payload_iat: iat (Issued At): Time at which the JWT was issued
jwt_analyzer.payload_jti: jti (JWT ID): Unique identifier for the JWT
jwt_analyzer.signature_tooltip: The secret key ensures the integrity and security of the JWT. Risks include key leakage attacks and key confusion attacks.

fuzz.title: Directory Scan
fuzz.select_scan_result: Select a scan result to view details

notifications.enter_valid_proxy: Please enter a valid proxy address

authorization_checker.title: Authorization Checker
authorization_checker.no_rules: No rules defined. Click "Add Rule" above to create the first rule.
authorization_checker.no_results: No test results yet. Start authorization detection and send requests to generate results.
authorization_checker.loading_rules: Loading rules for the first time...
authorization_checker.select_result: Select a test result from the left list to view details
authorization_checker.original_value: Original Value (empty means match any value, supports regex)
authorization_checker.filter_scope_help: When enabled, only requests containing URLs in the include list will be checked for authorization bypass
authorization_checker.include_urls_help: Requests containing these URL strings will be detected
authorization_checker.exclude_urls_help: Requests containing these URL strings will be skipped
authorization_checker.include_file_types_help: Leave empty to not restrict file types
authorization_checker.exclude_file_types_help: Requests for these file types will be skipped
authorization_checker.search_placeholder: Search URL, rule description, status code...

notifications.filter_config_saved: Filter configuration saved, new configuration will take effect immediately

matchReplace.replacePlaceholder: Replacement string (can use $1, $2, etc. for capture groups)

settings.title: Settings
settings.auto_load_description: Automatically open the last used project when the application starts
settings.auto_save_description: Set the time interval for automatically saving the project
settings.default_location_description: Set the default location for saving new projects
settings.welcome_screen_description: Display the welcome screen when the application starts
settings.font_size_description: Adjust the overall font size of the application

font_size.custom_hint: Enter a value between 10 and 24 pixels

font_family.hint: Enter the name of a font installed on your system

settings.font_sample_text: This is a sample text to preview the font size and family settings. You can see how the text looks with different font sizes and families.
settings.table_density_description: Adjust the compactness of table rows
settings.proxy_coming_soon: Proxy settings will be implemented in a future update.
settings.network_coming_soon: Network settings will be implemented in a future update.
settings.update_available_msg: New version {version} is available, click to view details
settings.regex_invalid_hint: Please enter a valid regular expression

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.description: Configure Claude AI assistant for security analysis and automation.
ai.configured_desc: Claude AI is ready to use
ai.configured_not_init_desc: Click "Initialize" to start using Claude Code
ai.not_configured_desc: Please enter your API key to enable AI features
ai.api_key_hint: Get your API key from the Anthropic Console.
ai.base_url_hint: Custom API endpoint for proxy or self-hosted services. Leave empty for default.
ai.model_hint: Select the Claude model for AI conversations.
ai.max_tokens_hint: Maximum number of tokens in the response (1024-8192).
ai.temperature_hint: Lower values make output more focused, higher values more creative.
ai.tool_confirm_hint: When enabled, you will be asked to confirm before executing scans or sending requests.
ai.cli_path_hint: Path to Claude Code CLI executable. Leave empty to use system PATH.
ai.work_dir_placeholder: Leave empty to use current directory
ai.work_dir_hint: Working directory for Claude Code operations.
ai.max_turns_hint: Maximum conversation turns per session. 0 = unlimited.
ai.permission_mode_hint: Controls how Claude Code handles tool permissions.
ai.system_prompt_hint: Additional instructions for Claude. Security context is automatically included.
ai.mcp_mode_hint: SSE for HTTP-based communication, STDIO for process-based.
ai.mcp_port_hint: Set to 0 for automatic port selection.
ai.mcp_hint: MCP Server provides security tools to Claude Code for vulnerability scanning and analysis.
ai.external_mcp_desc: Configure external MCP servers to extend Claude's capabilities.
ai.mcp_server_url_required: Server URL is required for SSE mode
ai.mcp_server_command_required: Command is required for STDIO mode

project.delete_warning: This action will permanently delete the project data and cannot be undone.
project.app_starting_desc: Please wait, preparing the security testing environment...
project.literary_quote: 将旦昧爽之交，日夕昏明之际，北面而察之，淡淡焉若有物存，莫识其状。其所触也，窃窃然有声，经物而物不疾也。
project.create_first: Please create a new project first
project.project_name_hint: Project name will be used to identify your test project
project.temp_project_desc: Temporary projects automatically create timestamped database files. Data will be saved. Suitable for quick testing.
project.select_action_hint: Select a project action from the left

welcome.title: Welcome to AI Security Assistant
